ShareX.Description: Screen capture, file sharing and productivity tool

VLC Media Player.Description: VLC Media Player is a free and open-source, cross-platform media player and streaming media server

AIMP.Description: AIMP is a free audio player for Windows that supports a wide range of audio formats and offers advanced features like sound effects, equalizer, and playlist management

PotPlayer.Description: PotPlayer is a free media player for Windows that supports a wide range of video and audio formats, offering advanced features like subtitle support, video capture, and customizable skins

Audacity.Description: Audacity is a free, open source, cross-platform audio software for multi-track recording and editing

K-Lite Codec Pack.Description: K-Lite Codec Pack is a collection of codecs, DirectShow filters and tools

MPC-HC.Description: MPC-HC is a lightweight, open source media player for Windows that supports a wide range of video and audio formats, offering advanced features like subtitle support, video capture, and customizable skins

Spotify.Description: Spotify is a digital music service that gives you access to millions of songs

OBS Studio.Description: OBS Studio is free and open source software for video recording and live streaming
